lead_paragraph: The chairman of the U.S. Olympic Committee defended his support of the decision not to ban Russia's entire team from the Rio Games, framing it as a done deal by the time he weighed in on it, and a stance that received wide support among athletes.

headline.print_headline: USOC Leader Defends Stance on Russian Doping
headline.main: USOC Leader Defends Stance on Russian Doping

snippet: The chairman of the U.S. Olympic Committee defended his support of the decision not to ban Russia's entire team from the Rio Games, framing it as a done deal by the time he weighed in on it, and a stance that received wide support among athletes....
